item.title: Book on a Rod
item.description: The Problem I was wondering how to quantitatively represent the capacity of an VAE’s latent variable (or a reconstruction step of a diffusion model) in bits, making it comparable to other distributions, such as the data distribution? Book on a Rod Then, a paradox I saw like 8 years ago came to my mind: “Theoretically, you can store all information of a book on a rod. To do that, encode the book’s content into a decimal string, put it behind 0.
